data.title: Mobile Suit Gundam SEED Film Sequel, New Spin-Off Projects Announced
data.meta_description: To commemorate Gundam SEED's 20th anniversary, a new anime film was announced along with new projects including a new manga.
data.text:
To commemorate the 20th anniversary of the Mobile Suit Gundam SEED anime next year, Bandai Namco Group announced the Mobile Suit Gundam SEED PROJECT ignited at the opening of the life-size Freedom Gundam statue in Shanghai.

The projects that was announced is a Mobile Suit Gundam SEED sequel film, which will be led by returning director Mitsuo Fukuda. Details such as the premiere date and plot will be announced in a later date. Next is a new Mobile Suit Gundam SEED game, and just like the new anime film, more details will be revealed in a later date.
